verses.verse: And again <S%G3825><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum <S%G2584><s%> after <S%G1223><s%> some days; <S%G2250><s%> and it was noised <S%G191><s%> that he was in the house. <S%G3624><s%>

And straightway <S%G2112><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together, <S%G4863><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that there was no <S%G3371><s%> room <S%G5562><s%> to receive <S%G5562><s%> them, no, not so <S%G3366><s%> much <S%G3366><s%> as about <S%G4314><s%> the door: <S%G2374><s%> and he preached <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> to them.
And they come <S%G2064><s%> to him, bringing <S%G5342><s%> one sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy, <S%G3885><s%> which was borne <S%G142><s%> of four. <S%G5064><s%>

And when they could <S%G1410><s%> not come <S%G4331><s%> near to him for the press, <S%G3793><s%> they uncovered <S%G648><s%> the roof <S%G4721><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> he was: and when they had broken <S%G1846><s%> it up, they let <S%G5465><s%> down <S%G5465><s%> the bed <S%G2895><s%> wherein <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy <S%G3885><s%> lay. <S%G2621><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> their faith, <S%G4102><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to the sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy, <S%G3885><s%> Son, <S%G5043><s%> your sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> you.
But there was certain <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> and reasoning <S%G1260><s%> in their hearts, <S%G2588><s%>

Why <S%G5101><s%> does this <S%G3778><s%> man thus <S%G3779><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> blasphemies? <S%G988><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> only? <S%G1520><s%>

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> perceived <S%G1921><s%> in his spirit <S%G4151><s%> that they so <S%G3779><s%> reasoned <S%G1260><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> reason <S%G1260><s%> you these <S%G5023><s%> things in your <S%G5216><s%> hearts? <S%G2588><s%>

Whether <S%G5101><s%> is it easier <S%G2123><s%> to say <S%G2036><s%> to the sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy, <S%G3885><s%> Your sins <S%G266><s%> be forgiven <S%G863><s%> you; or <S%G2228><s%> to say, <S%G2036><s%> Arise, <S%G1453><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up your bed, <S%G2895><s%> and walk? <S%G4043><s%>

But that you may know <S%G1492><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%> (he said <S%G3004><s%> to the sick <S%G3885><s%> of the palsy, <S%G3885><s%>)
I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Arise, <S%G1453><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up your bed, <S%G2895><s%> and go <S%G5217><s%> your way into <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

And immediately <S%G2112><s%> he arose, <S%G1453><s%> took <S%G142><s%> up the bed, <S%G2895><s%> and went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> before <S%G1726><s%> them all; <S%G3956><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they were all <S%G3956><s%> amazed, <S%G1839><s%> and glorified <S%G1392><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> We never <S%G3763><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it on this <S%G3779><s%> fashion. <S%G3778><s%>

And he went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> by the sea <S%G2281><s%> side; <S%G3844><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> resorted <S%G2064><s%> to him, and he taught <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> them.

And as he passed <S%G3855><s%> by, he saw <S%G1492><s%> Levi <S%G3018><s%> the son of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the receipt <S%G5058><s%> of custom, <S%G5058><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Follow <S%G190><s%> me. And he arose <S%G450><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that, as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sat <S%G2621><s%> at <S%G2621><s%> meat in his house, <S%G3614><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and sinners <S%G268><s%> sat <S%G4873><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> together <S%G4873><s%> with Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and his disciples: <S%G3101><s%> for there were many, <S%G4183><s%> and they followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And when the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him eat <S%G2068><s%> with publicans <S%G5057><s%> and sinners, <S%G268><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> How <S%G5101><s%> is it that he eats <S%G2068><s%> and drinks <S%G4095><s%> with publicans <S%G5057><s%> and sinners? <S%G268><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, They that are whole <S%G2480><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of the physician, <S%G2395><s%> but they that are sick: <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%> I came <S%G2064><s%> not to call <S%G2564><s%> the righteous, <S%G1342><s%> but sinners <S%G268><s%> to repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> and of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> used <S%G1510><s%> to fast: <S%G3522><s%> and they come <S%G2064><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Why <S%G1302><s%> do the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> and of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> fast, <S%G3522><s%> but your disciples <S%G3101><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> not?

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Can <S%G1410><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the bridal chamber <S%G3567><s%> fast, <S%G3522><s%> while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is with them? as long <S%G5550><s%> as they have <S%G2192><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> with them, they cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> fast. <S%G3522><s%>

But the days <S%G2250><s%> will come, <S%G2064><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> shall be taken <S%G522><s%> away <S%G522><s%> from them, and then <S%G5119><s%> shall they fast <S%G3522><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> sews <S%G1976><s%> a piece <S%G1915><s%> of new <S%G46><s%> cloth <S%G4470><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> an old <S%G3820><s%> garment: <S%G2440><s%> else <S%G1490><s%> the new <S%G2537><s%> piece <S%G4138><s%> that filled <S%G4138><s%> it up takes <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from the old, <S%G3820><s%> and the rent <S%G4978><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> worse. <S%G5501><s%>

And no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> puts <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> bottles: <S%G779><s%> else <S%G1490><s%> the new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> does burst <S%G4486><s%> the bottles, <S%G779><s%> and the wine <S%G3631><s%> is spilled, <S%G1632><s%> and the bottles <S%G779><s%> will be marred: <S%G622><s%> but new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> must be put <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> bottles. <S%G779><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that he went <S%G3899><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the corn <S%G4702><s%> fields on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day; and his disciples <S%G3101><s%> began, <S%G756><s%> as they went, <S%G3598><s%> <S%G4160><s%> to pluck <S%G5089><s%> the ears <S%G4719><s%> of corn. <S%G4719><s%>

And the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Behold, <S%G2396><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> they on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day that which <S%G3739><s%> is not lawful? <S%G1832><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Have you never <S%G3763><s%> read <S%G314><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> need, <S%G5532><s%> and was an hungered, <S%G3983><s%> he, and they that were with him?

How <S%G4459><s%> he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in the days <S%G1909><s%> of Abiathar <S%G8><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and did eat <S%G5315><s%> the show bread, <S%G740><s%> <S%G4286><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> but for the priests, <S%G2409><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to them which were with him?
And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, The sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> for man, <S%G444><s%> and not man <S%G444><s%> for the sabbath: <S%G4521><s%>
Therefore <S%G5620><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is Lord <S%G2962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>
